description:
Introducing Easy Dice for RPG/Tabletop, the ultimate tool tailored for both casual and professional players of Board Games and RPGs. Elevate your gaming experience with a host of features designed to enhance every tabletop adventure and make your gatherings/parties unforgettable. Here's what Easy Dice has to offer:

 - Universal Dice Selection: Roll a variety of dice including d2, d4, d6, d8, d10, d12, d20, and d100.

 - Multiple Roll Capability: Throw multiple dice at once with ease, streamlining your gameplay and saving time for more exciting moments.

- History Tracker: Keep track of your rolls with the built-in history feature.

- Adjustable Roll Counts: Customize your experience by increasing or decreasing the current number. 

- Effortless Restart: Hit the reset button with a single tap.

- Automatic Summation: Save time on calculations as the game automatically adds up the results of your dice rolls.

 - Immersive Features: Feel the thrill with vibration feedback during each dice throw and enjoy the realistic sounds of dice hitting the tabletop.

- Universal Gaming: Extend the fun beyond RPGs

- Party-Ready: Elevate your gatherings with Easy Dice. Whether it's a holiday celebration or a casual get-together, this game brings an extra layer of excitement to any party.

Experience the next level of tabletop gaming with Easy Dice for RPG/Tabletop. Streamlined, immersive, and loaded with features, it's the perfect companion for your gaming adventures. Download now and let the dice roll!
name: Easy Dice for RPG/Tabletop
intro: Every Dice Roll Sparks the Life of the Party!
